bibl.title: Letter from Charles H. Coles to Philip Showalter Hench, March 25, 1942

div1.p: Coles informs Hench that the painting of Camp Lazear is in the American Museum of Natural History.

div1.head: Letter from Charles H. Coles to Philip Showalter Hench, March 25, 1942

Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
With reference to all our correspondence about
the painting, Camp Lazear, we have, by accident, found that
it is right here in our own Museum.

We believe you will be quite interested in this
bit of information.

closer.signed:
Charles H. Coles
Chief of Photographic
Division
